programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o vibes.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 2
; Instrument #1. instr 1 ; kamp = 20000 ; kfreq = 440 ; ihrd = 0.5 ; ipos = p4 ; imp = 1 ; kvibf = 6.0 ; kvamp = 0.05 ; ivibfn = 2 ; idec = 0.1 asig vibes 20000, 440, .5, p4 , 1, 6.0, 0.05, 2, .1 outs asig, asig endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Table #1, the "marmstk1.wav" audio file. f 1 0 256 1 "marmstk1.wav" 0 0 0 ; Table #2, a sine wave for the vibrato. f 2 0 128 10 1
; Play Instrument #1 for four seconds. i 1 0 4 0.561 i 1 + 4 1 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
